welcome.title: Welcome to Your Project
welcome.description: This tour will guide you through submitting your expert opinion and understanding the results.

opinionForm.title: Your Opinion Form
opinionForm.description: Enter your expert estimate here using three values: lower bound, peak (most likely), and upper bound.

fuzzyValues.title: Fuzzy Triangular Number
fuzzyValues.description: Lower is your pessimistic estimate, Peak is your most likely value, Upper is your optimistic estimate. Values must satisfy: Lower ≤ Peak ≤ Upper.

preview.title: Live Preview
preview.description: See your fuzzy number visualized as a triangle in real-time as you enter values.

saveButton.title: Save Your Opinion
saveButton.description: Click here to submit your opinion. You can update it anytime by changing the values and saving again.

otherOpinions.title: Other Expert Opinions
otherOpinions.description: View what other experts have submitted. Opinions are sorted by centroid value (center of gravity).

results.title: Best Compromise Result
results.description: This is the optimal aggregation of all expert opinions using the BeCoMe method. It represents the best agreement among all viewpoints.

visualization.title: Visualization
visualization.description: See how individual opinions compare to the final Best Compromise. Toggle 'Show individual opinions' to see all expert triangles.

complete.title: You're Ready!
complete.description: Start by entering your opinion. The results update automatically as experts submit their estimates.
